elements.name: Intro_csb
elements.html:
Code.org Self-paced Online Professional Learning - Computer Science Basics

Post-Unit Survey

Thanks for learning with us!

Code.org relies on surveys as a crucial tool through which we remain connected to teachers, and to give you the opportunity to provide feedback about our curriculum and your teaching experience, as well as to improve our programs.

Privacy and Confidentiality

  • Your individual responses here are completely confidential.
  • Your identity will never be revealed publicly or used to tie any responses back to you personally.
  • We may share anonymous, aggregate data (representing all responses) publicly.
  • Your anonymized responses will be used by Code.org for program improvement.

Your honesty and candor are appreciated.

Computer Science Basics - {survey_variable_name}

Post-Unit Survey

elements.name: csb_better_understanding
elements.title: After completing this module, I have a better understanding of basic computer science concepts.

elements.name: csb_comfort_supporting_students_spritelab
elements.title: After completing this module, I am more comfortable in my ability to support students learning introductory computer science concepts.

elements.name: csb_know_what_students_learn
elements.title: After completing this module, I have a basic understanding of what my students will learn in Code.org’s K-5 curriculum.

elements.name: csb_comfort_ability_to_teach
elements.title: After completing this module, I feel more comfortable in my ability to teach Code.org’s K-5 curriculum than I did before starting this professional learning course.

elements.name: csb_supported_learning
elements.title: Which of the following supported your learning the most? Rank the options from most helpful (5) to least helpful (1). Please apply each rank (1-5) exactly once; don't give the same ranking to two different items.

rows.text: Reading a page that contained text and images about a topic.
Trying a task with step by step instructions.
Making a plan to prepare to teach computer science.
Completing a check for understanding question.

elements.name: csb_how_long_to_complete
elements.title: How long did you spend completing this module?

elements.name: csb_how_likely_attend_inperson
elements.title: After engaging in this self-paced professional learning module, how likely are you to attend a facilitator-led professional development workshop for teaching Code.org's K-5 curriculum, if one were offered in your region?

elements.name: csb_other_feedback
elements.title: Do you have any feedback about this module that you would like to share with the Code.org team?

elements.name: csb_participate_focus_group
elements.title: OPTIONAL: Would you be willing to participate in a follow-up focus group to provide direct feedback about this online course?

elements.name: csb_email_focus_group
elements.title: Great! Please share an email address where we may contact you.
